attributes.action: Parents of long term sick children to visit together during COVID restrictions
attributes.background:
Both parents of seriously sick children in hospital to be granted permission to visit & sit with sick children at the same time during COVID restrictions. 

Mental health & keeping families together - bonding.

rejection.details:
Under the current Covid-19 restrictions you are allowed to leave your home to visit someone who is in a hospital: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/national-lockdown-stay-at-home

Visitng policies for individual hospitals are a matter for NHS England and individual NHS trusts, not the Government or House of Commons. You should contact your local hospital to find out what their visiting policy is.
